item.title: About Me
item.description: Hey ðŸ‘‹, I’m Juri Strumpflohner, a years old software developer. Currently I work as a JavaScript Architect and Engineering Manager at Nrwl where I work on Open Source projects such as Nx and NxCloud and help clients succeed with their projects.

item.title: Juri's Brain Dump
item.description: Juri’s Brain Dump aka “Newsletter” Hey ðŸ‘‹ yes I launched a newsletter. Well, I don’t like the term “newsletter” as it sounds like spammy advertising emails.

item.title: Public Speaking
item.description: Here are some of my appearances on conferences, online talks, workshops and podcasts. item.title: Workshop: Angular Fundamentals
item.description: This is a beginner level workshop, introducing the participants to developing modern web applications with Angular. Topics Some of the covered topics are the following:
